import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Form = () => { const {id}= useParams(); // this should contain the room id for which these responses must be set const [name, setName]= useState(""); const [rollno, setRollno]= useState("") return ( <>
{setName(e.target.value)}} />
{setEmail(e.target.value)}} />
) } export default Form
